body:
"Vampire" is a thing... Alright.
This sound like a Kuroneko-est Novel to be honest.
The shiki part is only the setting
This was pretty funny, I love the censor bar comment, the ending is slightly confusing since he has no bites on his neck and it's night time yet he says it is morning.

...Wut. o.O I mean, I guess, with that ending... I guess they really are vampires, now? But why OreImo as a base? Was it actually a dream, or did it really happen? Can they really not have children? WHY, GOD?! WHYYYY?! *ahem* In summation: ...Wut.
